title: Persistent Customer Selection
goal: Ensure a chosen customer remains selected even if the lookup input is cleared, only changing when a new customer is picked.
environment: HTML + Vanilla JavaScript + Firebase + Jest + jsdom

specs.title: ChangeCustomerControlClearsSelection
specs.given: A customer is already selected and shown in the sale header summary pill.
specs.when: The admin clicks the explicit Change customer control.
specs.then: The summary resets to an empty state, the hidden customerId clears, and the lookup is ready for a new selection.

summary.details: Change customer control verified across the updated Jest suite (see codex_output/reports/F09-TP5_green.txt).

changeNotes: Change customer control is wired into salesHeader.js and admin.html, clearing the hidden customerId, summary pill, and downstream state without needing to reopen the lookup.
notes: F09-TP5 builds on the customer lookup and sale header modules by persisting the selected customer until the admin explicitly changes it. Clearing the search box or typing a new query must not drop the selection; only selecting a different row or hitting the Change customer button should reset the state.
